attributes.action: The Government should provide more funds to help Scottish Football
attributes.additional_details: Scottish Football over the last 25 years has been in decline. We need more help to be able to get scottish football back to the standard it used to be. The extra money will help the grass roots game in scotland and help us get world class players coming through the ranks once again.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the Devolved Scottish Government.
